function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate understanding of biophilic design principles leading to inefficient integration of \\'nature\\' in architecture.","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risks associated with shortages of essential medical resources, including sars-cov-2 testing kits, ventilators, and personal protective equipment.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with increased demand for ventilators","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate accessibility to personal protective equipment (PPE)","category":"Inadequate mobility schemes","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risks associated with inadequate cleaning and maintenance of built environment contributing to disease transmission","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with inadequate ventilation and indoor air quality control leading to pathogen transmission","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interpersonal transmission risks due to inadequate indoor and outdoor points of interest (POIs) in proportion to resident density and demands.","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of flexible mobility choices for long-distance travelers on public transit","category":"Inadequate mobility schemes","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
